subject: Missing Haptic Engines, Order #SSN5104
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I received my order yesterday on 30.12.2025, unfortunately I had to find out when unpacking that the haptic engines and everything to mount on the pedals are missing, so the question is, will they be shipped extra?

This would be the order number: #SSN5104

In my package were the pedals themselves and the base plate.

With kind regards
Stefan Herler

‐-----------------------------------------------------------
Stefan Herler
Sixtgasse 18/2
8700 Leoben
Österreich

Tele: 0660 / 2156207
E-Mail: stefan.herler@outlook.com

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Stefan Herler,  The items were shipped separately, and we have submitted two tracking numbers in our system. You can use them to track your shipments.
